translations: 幽默，幽默感；感觉，心情；体液；<旧> 古怪念头，想入非非

sentences.sentence: Charles was brave and remarkably good-humoured.
sentences.translation: 查尔斯很勇敢，脾气也好。

sentences.sentence: Once the meal starts, you'll all be very busy waiting on the tables and I'm sure I don't need to tell you to be good-humoured and polite to all the guests.
sentences.translation: 一开饭，你们都会在餐桌上忙得不可开交，我相信不用说你们都明白要和善与礼貌地对待所有的客人。
